Articles.Content:
Hello,

i am using mechjeb on linux. Some os the features of mechjeb make de game hangs, with NO LOG output.

Gave me problem so far:

>Planet transfer

>Hohmann transfer

Any ideas? i dont even get an crash or a log, i have no idea what is this problem. Autoland, acendency guide, general menuever planer, they work well. It only some functions that are broke.

Welcome to the forums!

There is *always* log output; see the READ FIRST sticky in this forum for details. Please follow its guidelines.
